inkball

Class Hole

  • java.lang.Object
    • inkball.GameObject
      • inkball.Hole

  • public class Hole
extends GameObject
    Hole class represents the holes on the board where the balls are captured. The hole can capture a ball if the ball is within the hole's radius.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class inkball.GameObject

        sprite, x, y
